cleanup.description: Replace a DevCycle variable with a static value in the current version of your code. Currently only JavaScript is supported.
examples: <%= config.bin %> <%= command.id %> some-var --value "My Custom Name" --type String

config-path.name: config-path
config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the user.yml file

auth-path.name: auth-path
auth-path.description: Override the default location to look for an auth.yml file

repo-config-path.name: repo-config-path
repo-config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the repo config.yml file

client-id.name: client-id
client-id.description: Client ID to use for DevCycle API Authorization

client-secret.name: client-secret
client-secret.description: Client Secret to use for DevCycle API Authorization

project.name: project
project.description: Project key to use for the DevCycle API requests

no-api.name: no-api
no-api.description: Disable API-based enhancements for commands where authorization is optional. Suppresses warnings about missing credentials.

headless.name: headless
headless.description: Disable all interactive flows and format output for easy parsing.

caller.name: caller
caller.description: The integration that is calling the CLI.

value.name: value
value.description: Value to use in place of variable.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of the value that will be replacing the variable. Valid values include: String, Boolean, Number, JSON

include.name: include
include.description: Files to include when scanning for variables to cleanup. By default all files are included. Accepts multiple glob patterns.

exclude.name: exclude
exclude.description: Files to exclude when scanning for variables to cleanup. By default all files are included. Accepts multiple glob patterns.

output.name: output
output.description: Where the refactored code will be output. By default it overwrites the source file.

var-alias.name: var-alias
var-alias.description: Aliases to use when identifying variables in your code. Should contain a code reference mapped to a DevCycle variable key, eg. "--var-alias "VARIABLES.ENABLE_V1=enable-v1"

diff.description: Print a diff of DevCycle variable usage between two versions of your code.

config-path.name: config-path
config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the user.yml file

auth-path.name: auth-path
auth-path.description: Override the default location to look for an auth.yml file

repo-config-path.name: repo-config-path
repo-config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the repo config.yml file

client-id.name: client-id
client-id.description: Client ID to use for DevCycle API Authorization

client-secret.name: client-secret
client-secret.description: Client Secret to use for DevCycle API Authorization

project.name: project
project.description: Project key to use for the DevCycle API requests

no-api.name: no-api
no-api.description: Disable API-based enhancements for commands where authorization is optional. Suppresses warnings about missing credentials.

headless.name: headless
headless.description: Disable all interactive flows and format output for easy parsing.

caller.name: caller
caller.description: The integration that is calling the CLI.

file.name: file
file.description: File path of existing diff file to inspect.

client-name.name: client-name
client-name.description: Name(s) of the DevCycle client variable to match on. Accepts multiple values.

match-pattern.name: match-pattern
match-pattern.description: Additional full Regex pattern to use to match variable usages in your code. Should contain exactly one capture group which matches on the key of the variable. Must specify the file extension to override the pattern for, eg. "--match-pattern js=<YOUR PATTERN>"

var-alias.name: var-alias
var-alias.description: Aliases to use when identifying variables in your code. Should contain a code reference mapped to a DevCycle variable key, eg. "--var-alias "VARIABLES.ENABLE_V1=enable-v1"

pr-link.name: pr-link
pr-link.description: Link to the PR to use for formatting the line number outputs with clickable links.

format.name: format
format.description: Format to use when outputting the diff results.

show-regex.name: show-regex
show-regex.description: Output the regex pattern used to find variable usage

diff-pattern.name: diff-pattern
diff-pattern.description: A "git diff"-compatible diff pattern, eg. "branch1 branch2"

environments:create.description: Create a new Environment for an existing Feature.

usages.description: Print all DevCycle variable usages in the current version of your code.

config-path.name: config-path
config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the user.yml file

auth-path.name: auth-path
auth-path.description: Override the default location to look for an auth.yml file

repo-config-path.name: repo-config-path
repo-config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the repo config.yml file

client-id.name: client-id
client-id.description: Client ID to use for DevCycle API Authorization

client-secret.name: client-secret
client-secret.description: Client Secret to use for DevCycle API Authorization

project.name: project
project.description: Project key to use for the DevCycle API requests

no-api.name: no-api
no-api.description: Disable API-based enhancements for commands where authorization is optional. Suppresses warnings about missing credentials.

headless.name: headless
headless.description: Disable all interactive flows and format output for easy parsing.

caller.name: caller
caller.description: The integration that is calling the CLI.

include.name: include
include.description: Files to include when scanning for usages. By default all files are included. Accepts multiple glob patterns.

exclude.name: exclude
exclude.description: Files to exclude when scanning for usages. By default all files are included. Accepts multiple glob patterns.

client-name.name: client-name
client-name.description: Name(s) of the DevCycle client variable to match on. Accepts multiple values.

match-pattern.name: match-pattern
match-pattern.description: Additional full Regex pattern to use to match variable usages in your code. Should contain exactly one capture group which matches on the key of the variable. Must specify the file extension to override the pattern for, eg. "--match-pattern js=<YOUR PATTERN>"

var-alias.name: var-alias
var-alias.description: Aliases to use when identifying variables in your code. Should contain a code reference mapped to a DevCycle variable key, eg. "--var-alias "VARIABLES.ENABLE_V1=enable-v1"

format.name: format
format.description: Format to use when outputting the usage results.

show-regex.name: show-regex
show-regex.description: Output the regex pattern used to find variable usage

variables:create.description: Create a new Variable for an existing Feature.

config-path.description: Override the default location to look for the user.yml file
